Html:
I can create a link from a product code to take me to an online product detail page.

I can create an 'view image' icon and locate it in a cell.

But I can't see how to make the icon image clickable

Is it possible to do this?

 

Thanks.

Images aren't actually located in cells, but rather overlay cells, otherwise you could make a link for the cell itself.

I'll create a Work Item for attaching hyperlinks to the image itself, because it isn't possible currently.
